MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML8 postcode area of Carluke. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.30pm. So far we have managed to restore power to a number of properties and our engineers are working to repair an overhead line fault near to Hyndshaw for our customers still without power.  We now are working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.57AM on 9th December 2020.
